title: PRICE DROP! ONLY 1 Available-1st Floor!
posting_body: ['Our Community is A+', 'Welcome home to Arapahoe Club', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Arapahoe Club', '2800 S. Syracuse Way, Denver, CO, 80231', 'More unit details at:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 812 Sq.', 'Ft.', "From the first moment you visit into Arapahoe Club, you'll enjoy being surrounded by lush landscaping and enhanced dramatic architecture that gives Arapahoe Club a unique park like setting and atmosphere.", 'A private community and elegant apartment homes are only part of the picture at Arapahoe Club.', 'Convenient town and country location, a staff dedicated to you and a quality life-style at Arapahoe Club creates a living experience unequaled in the southeast Denver Area.', 'A former site to the distinguished Arapahoe Riding Club, the community is located in the prestigious Cherry Creek School District.', 'Only minutes from Denver Tech Center (DTC), Cherry Creek Mall, downtown Denver, major freeways, and traffic corridors, such as Interstate 25 and 225, Yale Avenue, Hampden Avenue, and Monaco Parkway.', 'Arapahoe Club is situated only minutes from a variety fine restaurants, licensed childcare centers, major shopping malls, banks, gold courses, health clubs, and Cherry Creek Reservoir where you can experience a vast array of recreational sports.', 'The Highline Canal, a popular route for walking, running, and cycling enthusiasts is right outside your front door.', 'Stop by Arapahoe Club today and see why so many other people chose us as their place to call home!', 'We are close to work, close to play, close to perfect!', 'Features', '- Cable/Satelite Available', '- Frost-Free Refrigerator', '- Optional detached garages to supplement ample open parking', '- Spacious Floor Plans', '- Pet Friendly (up to 2 pets 40Lbs or less)', '- Disability Access', '- High Speed Internet Available', '- Air Conditioning', '- Washer Dryer Included', '- Garbage Disposal', '- Spectacular City & Mountain Views - select units', '- 9ft Ceilings', '- Large Bedrooms', '- Garages', '- Private Balconies/Patios', '- Balcony', '- Central Air', '- Gas Fireplace', '- Dishwasher', '- Conventional Kitchen', '- Deadbolt Entry lock w/ Privacy View', '- One and Two Bedroom Apartments', '- Walk', 'In closets', '- Reserved Covered Parking', '- Individual Hot Water Heaters', '- Electric Stove', '- Onsite Maintenance', '- Easy-care tiled entry ways', '- Window Coverings', '- Carpeting', 'Community Amenities', '- Pets Allowed', '- High-Speed Internet Available', '- Virtual cafe with laptops, printer, and copier', '- Fitness Center', '- Package Acceptance At The Office', '- Convenient Location', '- Heated Swimming Pool', '- Hot Tub', '- Copy/Fax Available', '- Close to Shopping, Dining, Bus Routes and Much More!', '- Credit Cards Accepted', '- Resident BBQ Area', '- Clubhouse with WiFi', 'Pet Policy', 'Pets Allowed', 'Income Requirements:', '2.5 Rent Price', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-5:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-4:00PM', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'i96mk4DhXL']
